text: @brianstelter All hail the messiah Trump. He cometh to smite the coronavirus. All  ye follow thy master as he banishes this evil virus. What a crack of sh1t. Do these guys actually believe what they say? Trump is an idiot who is putting this country in danger for his political future.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
